overview: Live concert performance from English rock band Motörhead recorded at the Zenith in Munich, Germany on November 20th and 21st 2015. Filmed as part of their 40th anniversary tour, only a month before the death of their frontman, the tracks performed include 'Bomber', 'Over the Top', 'Ace of Spades' and 'Overkill'.
title: Motörhead: Clean Your Clock
